title: What is soil profile and soil texture? - Quora

response.answer_text: Soil profile This is the vertical layer of soil from the ground surface to downwards from where soil characteristics varies. The soil profile have five horizons like O, A, B, C and R.  Soil texture Soil texture is the classification of the soil based on its physical texture and characteristics.
